languages.text: "Я щит, клинок, тень — ничто из этого не обладает "личными чувствами".
"I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"
languages.original_text: "Я щит, клинок, тень — ничто из этого не обладает "личными чувствами".

traits.locale_text: "I am a shield, a blade, a shadow, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"
"I am a shield, a blade, a shadow, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"
"I am a shield, a blade, a shadow, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"
"I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"
"I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"

languages.text: "Ich bin ein Schild, ein Schatten, eine Klinge, und nichts davon hat 'persönliche Gefühle'."
languages.original_text: "I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin ein Schild, ein Schatten, eine Klinge, und nichts davon hat 'persönliche Gefühle'."

languages.text: « Je suis un bouclier, une ombre et une lame, autant de choses qui ne sont pas sujettes aux "sentiments intimes". »
languages.original_text: "I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis un bouclier, une ombre et une lame, autant de choses qui ne sont pas sujettes aux "sentiments intimes". »

languages.text: «Soy su escudo, su sombra y su espada. Ninguna de estas cosas tiene "sentimientos"».
languages.original_text: "I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"

traits.locale_text: «Soy su escudo, su sombra y su espada. Ninguna de estas cosas tiene "sentimientos"».

languages.text: 「私は盾であり、影であり、刃である。どれも個人的な感情は持たない」
languages.original_text: "I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"

traits.locale_text: 「私は盾であり、影であり、刃である。どれも個人的な感情は持たない」

languages.text: “我是坚盾、阴影、利刃，我没有什么‘个人感情’。”
languages.original_text: "I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"

traits.locale_text: “我是坚盾、阴影、利刃，我没有什么‘个人感情’。”

languages.original_text: "I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"

languages.text: "Ben bir kalkanım, gölgeyim, kılıcım. Bunlardan hiçbirinin 'duyguları' olamaz."
languages.original_text: "I am a shield, a shadow, a blade, none of which have 'personal feelings.'"
